name: Dark Queen Duck
description: What is the project about? Dark Queen Duck is a community driven meme game project on the Binance Smart Chain. The more ducks you hunt down the more tokens will be burned. It is a "Play to Burn" model used for this game. In order to play the game you need at least 1'000'000 token. What makes your project unique? Its a Play to Burn Model. The more you play the more token will be burned. History of your project. Project started being listed in Bitmart on 1.september 2023. Game already exists with the working burning model. Whatâ€™s next for your project? As the game already exists on desktop, next thing is that it works on the mobile phone. Also we start having an Airdrop through Bitmart and a trading competition. Later on we plan to create NFT's. What can your token be used for? You need the token in order to be able to play the game.
